alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Saline County through 915 AM CDT... At 844 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Cambria, or 7 miles northeast of Salina, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Gypsum, Smolan, New Cambria, Falun, Bridgeport, Salina Airport and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 78 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 246 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
